abstract: The regulator says the trader, Igor Oystacher, and his firm 3 Red Trading manipulated contracts for copper, oil and natural gas among others.
snippet: The regulator says the trader, Igor Oystacher, and his firm 3 Red Trading manipulated contracts for copper, oil and natural gas among others.
lead_paragraph: The trading tactic known as “spoofing” is again under scrutiny, with the Commodity Futures Trading Commission accusing a Chicago-based trader of a “pattern of manipulative and deceptive spoofing” for three years from December 2011 to January 2014 in various futures contracts.
